thread.title_full: Leaving Netflix in March 2017: 49 Movies and TV Shows That Will Stop Streaming Next Month | Glamour

author: Christopher Rosa
title: Leaving Netflix in March 2017: 49 Movies and TV Shows That Will Stop Streaming Next Month | Glamour
text:
AHY8N6 JAWS 1975 Universal film PHOTO: Pictorial Press Ltd / Alamy Stock Photo 
It's hard to imagine a world where you can't Netflix Jaws: The Revenge whenever you want, but that time is quickly approaching. Yes, this iconic film and the first three Jaws movies are leaving Netflix in March 2017. Why? Because life is hard and we can't have nice things. Just kidding. It probably has something to do with streaming rights, but that doesn't make this news any less devastating. You better plan that Jaws -themed party before March 1 or you'll be in for a world of (non-shark-related) pain. 
And the Jaws franchise isn't the only thing abandoning us next month. The Nanny Diaries , The Perfect Wedding , and the first three seasons of Robin Hood are among the 49 titles getting the hell out of dodge Netflix. Obviously, this means you need to cancel your wild Saint Patrick's Day plans (read: eating pizza outside) so you can marathon accordingly (read: eat pizza inside). Nothing is more important next month than watching American Dreamz before it disappears... forever . 
Below, check out all 49 movies and TV shows leaving Netflix in March 2017. (And to see what's coming—silver lining!—click here .) Leaving March 1
